snippet.textDisplay:
This is not just about that specific call to thomas. But using referees that are most of the times subjective on their calls and either deliberately or undeliberately not calling the right call that causing big time to decide a game, considering NBA is a multi billion dollars league.
It is so level 0 of game officiating. We are already on the start-up of the Age of Artificial intelligence. There would be time that basketball game wouldn't be needing those human referees because of their subjective decision making. They can use motion detection system for all the ten players on the floor, encrypting all the officiating rules. In that case, no uncall travels, fouls, or wrong call. In the future, NBA may use robots as referees, encrypting all the officiating rules in their memory.
Fans aren't coming in basketball game to see the referees; players and fans dont want the games to be decided by refs. Let players decide the game.
snippet.textOriginal:
This is not just about that specific call to thomas.  But using referees that are most of the times subjective on their calls and either deliberately or undeliberately not calling the right call that causing big time to decide a game, considering NBA is a multi billion dollars league.
It is so level 0 of game officiating. We are already on the start-up of the Age of Artificial intelligence. There would be time that basketball game wouldn't be needing those human referees because of their subjective decision making. They can use motion detection system for all the ten players on the floor, encrypting all the officiating rules. In that case, no uncall travels, fouls, or wrong call. In the future, NBA may use robots as referees, encrypting all the officiating rules in their memory.
Fans aren't coming in basketball game to see the referees; players and fans dont want the games to be decided by refs. Let players decide the game.

snippet.textDisplay: Players shouldn't get ejected for touching the ref. The ref should get ejected for touching the players. They're the ones playing the fucking game. Imagine this situation. The ball is about to go out of bounds. A player runs to save the ball. Then there's a dumb fuck ref like this one standing in the way of the player making a save. The player should be able to plow right through that ref if he is hindering the progression of the game. He is not a player. That would be another form of manipulating the game and giving one team an unfair advantage over the other.
